Data.Subject: A Silent Transaction Awaits
Data.Message:
A sensitive issue has arisen,
and I require a professional to resolve it.
Someone has made themselves a liability.

Offer: <color=green>$75,000</color> wired in <color=blue>Cryptocurrency</color>.
40% upfront, the remainder upon verification.

They frequent the old railyard at dusk,
always keeping to themselves.

This must be clean and unseen.

Reply with:
“Shadow Confirmed”.

More details will follow.
Be smart.
Be precise.
